mapper.sql: ydata_account_bind_id, ydata_account_id, open_id, create_time, modify_time, status, acct_type
mapper.insert: insert into ydata_account_bind (ydata_account_bind_id, ydata_account_id, open_id, create_time, modify_time, status, acct_type) values (#{ydataAccountBindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ydataAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ydata_account_bind
ydata_account_id = #{ydataAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acct_type = #{acctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ydata_account_bind_id = #{ydataAccountBindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ydata_account_bind set ydata_account_id = #{ydataAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acct_type = #{acctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ydata_account_bind_id = #{ydataAccountBindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update ydata_account_bind set status = 'INACTIVE', modify_time = now() where status = 'ACTIVE' and open_id in #{item}
update ydata_account_bind set status = 'INACTIVE', modify_time = now() where status = 'ACTIVE' and open_id = #{openid}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,b.ydata_uuid as ydata_uuid FROM ydata_account_bind a LEFT JOIN ydata_account b on a.ydata_account_id = b.ydata_account_id where 1=1
and a.`status` = #{bindStatus}
